name: Baklava
description: A rich, sweet pastry made of layers of filo filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with syrup or honey.
steps: Preheat the oven and grease the baking dish.
Layer the filo dough in the dish, brushing each sheet with melted butter and sprinkling chopped nuts between some of the layers.
Cut the layered pastry into diamond or square shapes before baking.
Immediately after baking, pour the prepared syrup evenly over the hot baklava.
Let cool to absorb the syrup before serving.
ingredients: 300 grams mixed nuts (walnuts, pistachios, almonds), chopped
tips: Keep the filo dough covered with a damp cloth to prevent drying out while working.
Cut the baklava before baking to make serving easier.
Ensure the syrup is hot when poured over the baklava to soak in properly.
